availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry H. Alsman (Washington County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, farmer. Garrard County, Kentucky, native. Son of Joshua Alsman and Avila Alsman. Married to Sarah Ann Sanders Alsman in Washington County, Kentucky, on September 9, 1852. Father of William T. Alsman, Cynthia Alsman, and James Alsman. Resident of Washington County in 1850. Farmer in Washington County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, p. 157B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, District No. 1, p. 182.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States(1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyle County, Shelby, p. 192A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994057, Washington County Marriages.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #192.
